issue.title: [Rust] Support reading nested JSON lists
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10770](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10770). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JSON reader now supports reading nested structs, but we are still left with nested lists, which can be lists of lists, or lists of structs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10770?focusedCommentId=17253026) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8938
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8938>
